title: New skin for Shyvana
body:
Shyvana needs a new skin 
write your thoughts and any skin concepts  i am open to if need arises i will pay an artist to draw it  up and send it to Riot

replies.body: Warden shyvana would look sick with all the shiny sliver plating
How about a water themed one where all her abilities are replaced with an aquatic theme and she becomes an awesome water dragon in her ult :D

Hextech Shyvana.
Its like a robotic model of a human/dragon then transforms into a Robotic dragon.

Bloodmoon Shyvana.
blood particle effects could look cool.

Arcade Shyvana.

Ands that's all I got for now XD
those are great ideas and i will have a talk to riot
